attributes.action: uphold his belief, stated at the unveiling of the statue of Nelson Mandela, that no injustice lasts forever and to remove the injustice to the English people of Scottish MP's determining and voting on laws which do not directly impact on their constituents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given than whenever Gordon Brown speaks on education, health and other issues in"Britain" he means "England" then he should remove the hypocrisy of MP's voting if it will not be an issue for their electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
